bibl.title: Dispatch from Augustus Archer Silva to William H. Seward
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.opener:
No 50
United States Coml Agency
St Paul de Loanda Sept 30 1868
div1.p:
Sir
I have the honor to inform the department that there were no arrivials or departures of American vessels of this port during the quarter ending this day in requiring no fees recieved A sworn statement I forward by this opportunity to the fifth Auditor of the Treasury.
My acct. current shows a balance in my favor of $250.00 for which acct. I have drawn on this Humble Secretray of the Treasury.

closer.salute:
I have the honor
to be
Your Most Obedt Sevt

address.addrLine: Hon. Secretary of State of State
